de.ralleytn.simple.audio

Interface Playable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Audio
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAudio, BufferedAudio, Playlist, StreamedAudio

    public interface Playable
    Implemented by everything that can be played.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getVolume() 
      boolean isMuted() 
      boolean isPaused() 
      boolean isPlaying() 
      void pause()
      Pauses the Playable.
      void play()
      Plays from the beginning.
      void resume()
      Resumes when paused.
      void setMute(boolean mute)
      Sets wherever the Playable should be muted or not.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      Sets the volume.
      void stop()
      Stops the Playable.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play()
        Plays from the beginning.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the Playable.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses the Playable.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resumes when paused.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float volume)
        Sets the volume. The given value is in decibel and is more like an amplifier to the volume and not the volume itself.
        Parameters:
        volume - the new volume
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • setMute

        void setMute(boolean mute)
        Sets wherever the Playable should be muted or not.
        Parameters:
        mute - true if it should be muted, else false
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • isMuted

        boolean isMuted()
        Returns:
        true if the Playable is muted, else false
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Returns:
        true if the Playable is currently playing, else false
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()
        Returns:
        true if the Playable is currently paused, else false
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • getVolume

        float getVolume()
        Returns:
        the current volume of the Playable
        Since:
        1.1.0
